column4: hi , i want to download the package conky (for dapper) manually with firefox , can anyone tell me how to find it?
i want the dapper package specificaly
in firefox where you have the google search box
why don't you do a aptitude download conky?
cause i want to use it on debian etch
why don't you download the debian package for it then?
the debian package has some sort of a bug that makes desktop items disappera but at the forum they suggested to use the dapper pacakages
i cant find a package search option in firefox
thanks , but how did you find it?
